code: import css from'./css';import listen from'./listen';import triggerEvent from'./triggerEvent';function parseDuration(node){var str=css(node,'transitionDuration')||'';var mult=str.indexOf('ms')===-1?1000:1;return parseFloat(str)*mult;}function emulateTransitionEnd(element,duration,padding){if(padding===void 0){padding=5;}var called=false;var handle=setTimeout(function(){if(!called)triggerEvent(element,'transitionend',true);},duration+padding);var remove=listen(element,'transitionend',function(){called=true;},{once:true});return function(){clearTimeout(handle);remove();};}export default function transitionEnd(element,handler,duration,padding){if(duration==null)duration=parseDuration(element)||0;var removeEmulate=emulateTransitionEnd(element,duration,padding);var remove=listen(element,'transitionend',handler);return function(){removeEmulate();remove();};}
